TopicTitle: Spaceflight related podcasts or shows on Youtube

Articles.Content:
Hi fellow Kerbals,

do you know some cool podcast or youtube shows which are worth watching which are space related?

I've found one following Podcast which I follow regular on my way to work (audio podcast): http://spacerockethistory.com/

Also following youtube show is worth watching: https://www.youtube.com/user/TMRO

Do you have other cool space related stuff ?
